verses.roman:
kiśora vayase ārambhilā saṅkīrtana
rātra-dine preme nṛtya, saṅge bhakta-gaṇa

synonyms: kiśora vayase—just before the beginning of His youthful life; ārambhilā—began; saṅkīrtana—the saṅkīrtana movement; rātra-dine—night and day; preme—in ecstasy; nṛtya—dancing; saṅge—along with; bhakta-gaṇa—the devotees.
translation: Just prior to His youthful life, He began the saṅkīrtana movement. Day and night He used to dance in ecstasy with His devotees.
